contents:
我剛剛看了一下維基列出來的評比指標，
我覺得樓主不算有理解錯呀，以下為23項指標，內部指的應該就是國家內部，不是國際吧？
要是有翻錯請指正，謝謝

1. 內部衝突的數量及持續時間 (Number and duration of internal conflicts)
2. 外部組織性衝突的死亡數(Number of deaths from external organized conflict)
3. 內部組織性衝突的死亡數(Number of deaths from internal organized conflict)
4. 外部衝突的數量、持續時間及角色 (Number, duration, and role in external conflicts)
5. 內部組織性衝突的劇烈程度 (Intensity of organized internal conflict)
6. 與周邊國家關係 (Relations with neighbouring countries)
7. 社會上可察覺之犯罪等級 (Level of perceived criminality in society)
8. 難民及流民之人口占比 (Number of refugees and displaced persons as percentage of population)
9. 政治不穩定性 (Political Instability)
10.恐怖主義影響 (Impact of terrorism)
11.政治*迫害 (Political terror)
12.每10萬人之被謀殺數 (Number of homicides per 100,000 people)
13.暴力犯罪等級 (Level of voilent crime)
14.暴力行為的可見度 (Likelihood of voilent demonstrations)
15.每10萬人之囚犯數 (Number of jailed persons per 100,000 people)
16.內部每10萬人之從事保安相關人員數 (Number of internal security officers and police per 100,000 people)
17.軍備支出GDP占比 (Military expenditure as a percentage of GDP)
18.每10萬人之武裝部隊人數 (Number of armed-services personnel per 100,000)
19.每10萬人之常規軍備進口量(Volume of transfers of major conventional weapons as recipient (imports) per 100,000 people)
20.每10萬人之常規軍備出口量(Volume of transfers of major conventional weapons as supplier (exports) per 100,000 people)
21.聯合國維和任務的財務貢獻(Financial contribution to UN peacekeeping missions)
22.核能和重武持有能力(Nuclear and heavy weapons capability)
23.小型及輕型武器的取得容易度(Ease of access to small arms and light weapons)
